original_text: but David could not go before it to inquire of God, for he was afraid of the sword of the angel of the Lord.
korean_text: 다윗이 여호와의 천사의 칼을 두려워하여 감히 그 앞에 가서 하나님께 묻지 못하더라

sentences.original_text: but David could not go before it
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 다윗은 그곳 앞에 갈 수 없었으니

sentences.original_text: of the sword of the angel of the Lord
